title: Detection & Response Optimization
summary: Operationalized SIEM, EDR, Detection Rules, and Runbookss to improve signal-to-noise ratio, automate triage, and cut mean time to response (MTTR) from hours to minutes.

title: Cloudflare Zero Trust Migration: Secure Access Without VPNs
summary: Led the enterprise rollout of Cloudflare Zero Trust, replacing legacy VPNs with identity-based access and device posture checks. Reduced access tickets by 80% and strengthened endpoint-to-cloud security with ZTNA principles.

title: Vulnerability & Patch Orchestration (InsightVM)
summary: Risk-based SLAs + patch waves to eliminate critical backlog and raise SLA adherence.
